215.673.3520

DR 4/36 SA Divider Rounder

Download Info Sheet

Contact Sales & Reps

# DR 4/36 SA Divider Rounder

  * Standard Features
  * Specifications

  * Manual dough dividing and powered rounding action

  * Automatic motor switch

  * Cast iron foot on wheels

  * Stainless steel dividing knife

  * Fixed dividing discs

  * Coated anodized aluminum dividing disc

  * Forward tilting system provides easier access for cleaning the dividing disc

  * Motors only run while machine is rounding

  * 36 Part Divider-produces 1 to 4 oz. pieces – total weight up to 8 lbs.

  * Shipping weight – approx. 785 lbs

  * Electrical: 208 Volts/60 Hz/3 phase – 4amps – .55kW

Dough distribution takes place in a smooth movement while the powerful
rounding motion gives you perfect round rolls.

The ability to prepare many different products throughout a working day lets
you respond quickly to consumer demands.

  * Shipping Weight: 785 lb
  * Weight of Individual Dough Pieces: 1.0 to 4.0 oz
  * Total Weight Range: 8 lb
  * Voltage: 208 V
  * Phase: 3
  * Frequency: 60 Hz
  * Current: 4 A
  * Power: 0.55 kW

**Available Options:**

  * Extra Rounding Plates
  * Set of pallet removal plates

Interested in this product or need more information?

Contact a Regional Sales Rep
